verses.text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christwho arein Colosse:
parts: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ
in Colosse:

verses.text: We give thanks to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and of your love for all the saints; because of the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, of which you heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel, which has come to you, asit hasalso in all the world, and is bringing forth fruit,aasit isalso among you since the day you heard and knew the grace of God in truth; as you also learned from Epaphras, our dear fellow servant, who is a faithful minister of Christ on your behalf, who also declared to us your love in the Spirit.
parts: We give thanks to the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, praying always for you,

since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and of your love for all the saints; because of the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, of which you heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel, which has come to you, as
also in all the world, and is bringing forth fruit,
as

also among you since the day you heard and knew the grace of God in truth; as you also learned from Epaphras, our dear fellow servant, who is a faithful minister of Christ on your behalf, who also declared to us your love in the Spirit.

verses.text: since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and of your love for all the saints;
parts: since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus and of your love for all the saints;

verses.text: because of the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, of which you heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel,
parts: because of the hope which is laid up for you in heaven, of which you heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel,

verses.text: which has come to you, asit hasalso in all the world, and is bringing forth fruit,aasit isalso among you since the day you heard and knew the grace of God in truth;
parts: which has come to you, as
also in all the world, and is bringing forth fruit,
as
also among you since the day you heard and knew the grace of God in truth;

verses.text: as you also learned from Epaphras, our dear fellow servant, who is a faithful minister of Christ on your behalf,
parts: as you also learned from Epaphras, our dear fellow servant, who is a faithful minister of Christ on your behalf,

verses.text: who also declared to us your love in the Spirit.
parts: who also declared to us your love in the Spirit.

verses.text: For this reason we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray for you, and to ask that you may be filled with the knowledge of His will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;that you may walk worthy of the Lord, fully pleasingHim,being fruitful in every good work and increasing in the knowledge of God; strengthened with all might, according to His glorious power, for all patience and longsuffering with joy; giving thanks to the Father who has qualified us to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in the light.He has delivered us from the power of darkness and conveyedusinto the kingdom of the Son of His love, in whom we have redemption through His blood,athe forgiveness of sins.
parts: For this reason we also, since the day we heard it, do not cease to pray for you, and to ask that you may be filled with the knowledge of His will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding;
that you may walk worthy of the Lord, fully pleasing

being fruitful in every good work and increasing in the knowledge of God; strengthened with all might, according to His glorious power, for all patience and longsuffering with joy; giving thanks to the Father who has qualified us to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in the light.
He has delivered us from the power of darkness and conveyed
into the kingdom of the Son of His love, in whom we have redemption through His blood,
the forgiveness of sins.

verses.text: that you may walk worthy of the Lord, fully pleasingHim,being fruitful in every good work and increasing in the knowledge of God;
parts: that you may walk worthy of the Lord, fully pleasing
being fruitful in every good work and increasing in the knowledge of God;

verses.text: strengthened with all might, according to His glorious power, for all patience and longsuffering with joy;
parts: strengthened with all might, according to His glorious power, for all patience and longsuffering with joy;

verses.text: giving thanks to the Father who has qualified us to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in the light.
parts: giving thanks to the Father who has qualified us to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in the light.

verses.text: He has delivered us from the power of darkness and conveyedusinto the kingdom of the Son of His love,
parts: He has delivered us from the power of darkness and conveyed
into the kingdom of the Son of His love,

verses.text: in whom we have redemption through His blood,athe forgiveness of sins.
parts: in whom we have redemption through His blood,
the forgiveness of sins.

verses.text: He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn over all creation.For by Him all things were created that are in heaven and that are on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or dominions or principalities or powers. All things were created through Him and for Him.And He is before all things, and in Him all things consist.And He is the head of the body, the church, who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead, that in all things He may have the preeminence.
parts: He is the image of the invisible God, the firstborn over all creation.

For by Him all things were created that are in heaven and that are on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or dominions or principalities or powers. All things were created through Him and for Him.

And He is before all things, and in Him all things consist.And He is the head of the body, the church, who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead, that in all things He may have the preeminence.

verses.text: For by Him all things were created that are in heaven and that are on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or dominions or principalities or powers.
parts: For by Him all things were created that are in heaven and that are on earth, visible and invisible, whether thrones or dominions or principalities or powers.

verses.text: And He is before all things, and in Him all things consist.
parts: And He is before all things, and in Him all things consist.

verses.text: And He is the head of the body, the church, who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead, that in all things He may have the preeminence.
parts: And He is the head of the body, the church, who is the beginning, the firstborn from the dead, that in all things He may have the preeminence.

verses.text: For it pleasedthe Father thatin Him all the fullness should dwell,and by Him to reconcile all things to Himself, by Him, whether things on earth or things in heaven, having made peace through the blood of His cross.
parts: For it pleased
in Him all the fullness should dwell,
and by Him to reconcile all things to Himself, by Him, whether things on earth or things in heaven, having made peace through the blood of His cross.

verses.text: and by Him to reconcile all things to Himself, by Him, whether things on earth or things in heaven, having made peace through the blood of His cross.
parts: and by Him to reconcile all things to Himself, by Him, whether things on earth or things in heaven, having made peace through the blood of His cross.

verses.text: And you, who once were alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now He has reconciled in the body of His flesh through death, to present you holy, and blameless, and above reproach in His sight—if indeed you continue in the faith, grounded and steadfast, and are not moved away from the hope of the gospel which you heard, which was preached to every creature under heaven, of which I, Paul, became a minister.
parts: And you, who once were alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works, yet now He has reconciled in the body of His flesh through death, to present you holy, and blameless, and above reproach in His sight—

if indeed you continue in the faith, grounded and steadfast, and are not moved away from the hope of the gospel which you heard, which was preached to every creature under heaven, of which I, Paul, became a minister.

verses.text: in the body of His flesh through death, to present you holy, and blameless, and above reproach in His sight—
parts: in the body of His flesh through death, to present you holy, and blameless, and above reproach in His sight—

verses.text: if indeed you continue in the faith, grounded and steadfast, and are not moved away from the hope of the gospel which you heard, which was preached to every creature under heaven, of which I, Paul, became a minister.
parts: if indeed you continue in the faith, grounded and steadfast, and are not moved away from the hope of the gospel which you heard, which was preached to every creature under heaven, of which I, Paul, became a minister.

verses.text: I now rejoice in my sufferings for you, and fill up in my flesh what is lacking in the afflictions of Christ, for the sake of His body, which is the church,of which I became a minister according to the stewardship from God which was given to me for you, to fulfill the word of God,the mystery which has been hidden from ages and from generations, but now has been revealed to His saints.To them God willed to make known what are the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles: whichais Christ in you, the hope of glory.Him we preach, warning every man and teaching every man in all wisdom, that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus.To thisendI also labor, striving according to His working which works in me mightily.
parts: I now rejoice in my sufferings for you, and fill up in my flesh what is lacking in the afflictions of Christ, for the sake of His body, which is the church,
of which I became a minister according to the stewardship from God which was given to me for you, to fulfill the word of God,
the mystery which has been hidden from ages and from generations, but now has been revealed to His saints.
To them God willed to make known what are the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles: which
is Christ in you, the hope of glory.Him we preach, warning every man and teaching every man in all wisdom, that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus.To this
I also labor, striving according to His working which works in me mightily.

verses.text: of which I became a minister according to the stewardship from God which was given to me for you, to fulfill the word of God,
parts: of which I became a minister according to the stewardship from God which was given to me for you, to fulfill the word of God,

verses.text: the mystery which has been hidden from ages and from generations, but now has been revealed to His saints.
parts: the mystery which has been hidden from ages and from generations, but now has been revealed to His saints.

verses.text: To them God willed to make known what are the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles: whichais Christ in you, the hope of glory.
parts: To them God willed to make known what are the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles: which
is Christ in you, the hope of glory.

verses.text: Him we preach, warning every man and teaching every man in all wisdom, that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus.
parts: Him we preach, warning every man and teaching every man in all wisdom, that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus.

verses.text: To thisendI also labor, striving according to His working which works in me mightily.
parts: To this
I also labor, striving according to His working which works in me mightily.

verses.text: that their hearts may be encouraged, being knit together in love, andattainingto all riches of the full assurance of understanding, to the knowledge of the mystery of God, both of the Father andaof Christ,
parts: that their hearts may be encouraged, being knit together in love, and
to all riches of the full assurance of understanding, to the knowledge of the mystery of God, both of the Father and
of Christ,

verses.text: in whom are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.
parts: in whom are hidden all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge.

verses.text: Now this I say lest anyone should deceive you with persuasive words.For though I am absent in the flesh, yet I am with you in spirit, rejoicing to see yourgoodorder and the steadfastness of your faith in Christ.
parts: Now this I say lest anyone should deceive you with persuasive words.For though I am absent in the flesh, yet I am with you in spirit, rejoicing to see your
order and the steadfastness of your faith in Christ.

verses.text: For though I am absent in the flesh, yet I am with you in spirit, rejoicing to see yourgoodorder and the steadfastness of your faith in Christ.
parts: For though I am absent in the flesh, yet I am with you in spirit, rejoicing to see your
order and the steadfastness of your faith in Christ.

verses.text: As you therefore have received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk in Him, rooted and built up in Him and established in the faith, as you have been taught, abounding in itawith thanksgiving.
parts: As you therefore have received Christ Jesus the Lord, so walk in Him, rooted and built up in Him and established in the faith, as you have been taught, abounding in it
with thanksgiving.

verses.text: rooted and built up in Him and established in the faith, as you have been taught, abounding in itawith thanksgiving.
parts: rooted and built up in Him and established in the faith, as you have been taught, abounding in it
with thanksgiving.

verses.text: Beware lest anyone cheat you through philosophy and empty deceit, according to the tradition of men, according to the basic principles of the world, and not according to Christ.For in Him dwells all the fullness of the Godhead bodily;and you are complete in Him, who is the head of all principality and power.
parts: Beware lest anyone cheat you through philosophy and empty deceit, according to the tradition of men, according to the basic principles of the world, and not according to Christ.
For in Him dwells all the fullness of the Godhead bodily;
and you are complete in Him, who is the head of all principality and power.

verses.text: For in Him dwells all the fullness of the Godhead bodily;
parts: For in Him dwells all the fullness of the Godhead bodily;

verses.text: and you are complete in Him, who is the head of all principality and power.
parts: and you are complete in Him, who is the head of all principality and power.

verses.text: In Him you were also circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, by putting off the body of the sinsaof the flesh, by the circumcision of Christ,buried with Him in baptism, in which you also were raised withHimthrough faith in the working of God, who raised Him from the dead.And you, being dead in your trespasses and the uncircumcision of your flesh, He has made alive together with Him, having forgiven you all trespasses, having wiped out the handwriting of requirements that was against us, which was contrary to us. And He has taken it out of the way, having nailed it to the cross.Having disarmed principalities and powers, He made a public spectacle of them, triumphing over them in it.
parts: In Him you were also circumcised with the circumcision made without hands, by putting off the body of the sins
of the flesh, by the circumcision of Christ,
buried with Him in baptism, in which you also were raised with

through faith in the working of God, who raised Him from the dead.And you, being dead in your trespasses and the uncircumcision of your flesh, He has made alive together with Him, having forgiven you all trespasses, having wiped out the handwriting of requirements that was against us, which was contrary to us. And He has taken it out of the way, having nailed it to the cross.Having disarmed principalities and powers, He made a public spectacle of them, triumphing over them in it.

verses.text: buried with Him in baptism, in which you also were raised withHimthrough faith in the working of God, who raised Him from the dead.
parts: buried with Him in baptism, in which you also were raised with
through faith in the working of God, who raised Him from the dead.

verses.text: And you, being dead in your trespasses and the uncircumcision of your flesh, He has made alive together with Him, having forgiven you all trespasses,
parts: And you, being dead in your trespasses and the uncircumcision of your flesh, He has made alive together with Him, having forgiven you all trespasses,

verses.text: having wiped out the handwriting of requirements that was against us, which was contrary to us.
parts: having wiped out the handwriting of requirements that was against us, which was contrary to us.

verses.text: Having disarmed principalities and powers, He made a public spectacle of them, triumphing over them in it.
parts: Having disarmed principalities and powers, He made a public spectacle of them, triumphing over them in it.

verses.text: So let no one judge you in food or in drink, or regarding a festival or a new moon or sabbaths,which are a shadow of things to come, but the substance is of Christ.Let no one cheat you of your reward, taking delight infalsehumility and worship of angels, intruding into those things which he has notaseen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind, and not holding fast to the Head, from whom all the body, nourished and knit together by joints and ligaments, grows with the increasethat isfrom God.
parts: So let no one judge you in food or in drink, or regarding a festival or a new moon or sabbaths,
which are a shadow of things to come, but the substance is of Christ.Let no one cheat you of your reward, taking delight in
humility and worship of angels, intruding into those things which he has not
seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind, and not holding fast to the Head, from whom all the body, nourished and knit together by joints and ligaments, grows with the increase
from God.

verses.text: which are a shadow of things to come, but the substance is of Christ.
parts: which are a shadow of things to come, but the substance is of Christ.

verses.text: Let no one cheat you of your reward, taking delight infalsehumility and worship of angels, intruding into those things which he has notaseen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,
parts: Let no one cheat you of your reward, taking delight in
humility and worship of angels, intruding into those things which he has not
seen, vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind,

verses.text: and not holding fast to the Head, from whom all the body, nourished and knit together by joints and ligaments, grows with the increasethat isfrom God.
parts: and not holding fast to the Head, from whom all the body, nourished and knit together by joints and ligaments, grows with the increase
from God.

verses.text: Therefore,aif you died with Christ from the basic principles of the world, why, asthoughliving in the world, do you subject yourselves to regulations— “Do not touch, do not taste, do not handle,” which all concern things which perish with the using—according to the commandments and doctrines of men?These things indeed have an appearance of wisdom in self-imposed religion,falsehumility, and neglect of the body,but areof no value against the indulgence of the flesh.
parts: Therefore,
if you died with Christ from the basic principles of the world, why, as

living in the world, do you subject yourselves to regulations— “Do not touch, do not taste, do not handle,” which all concern things which perish with the using—according to the commandments and doctrines of men?These things indeed have an appearance of wisdom in self-imposed religion,
humility, and neglect of the body,
of no value against the indulgence of the flesh.

verses.text: “Do not touch, do not taste, do not handle,”
parts: “Do not touch, do not taste, do not handle,”

verses.text: which all concern things which perish with the using—according to the commandments and doctrines of men?
parts: which all concern things which perish with the using—according to the commandments and doctrines of men?

verses.text: These things indeed have an appearance of wisdom in self-imposed religion,falsehumility, and neglect of the body,but areof no value against the indulgence of the flesh.
parts: These things indeed have an appearance of wisdom in self-imposed religion,
humility, and neglect of the body,
of no value against the indulgence of the flesh.

verses.text: Set your mind on things above, not on things on the earth.
parts: Set your mind on things above, not on things on the earth.

verses.text: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
parts: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

verses.text: When Christwho isour life appears, then you also will appear with Him in glory.
parts: When Christ
our life appears, then you also will appear with Him in glory.

verses.text: Therefore put to death your members which are on the earth: fornication, uncleanness, passion, evil desire, and covetousness, which is idolatry.Because of these things the wrath of God is coming upon the sons of disobedience, in which you yourselves once walked when you lived in them.
parts: Therefore put to death your members which are on the earth: fornication, uncleanness, passion, evil desire, and covetousness, which is idolatry.
Because of these things the wrath of God is coming upon the sons of disobedience, in which you yourselves once walked when you lived in them.

verses.text: Because of these things the wrath of God is coming upon the sons of disobedience,
parts: Because of these things the wrath of God is coming upon the sons of disobedience,

verses.text: in which you yourselves once walked when you lived in them.
parts: in which you yourselves once walked when you lived in them.

verses.text: But now you yourselves are to put off all these: anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy language out of your mouth.Do not lie to one another, since you have put off the old man with his deeds, and have put on the newmanwho is renewed in knowledge according to the image of Him who created him,where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcised nor uncircumcised, barbarian, Scythian, slavenorfree, but Christisall and in all.
parts: But now you yourselves are to put off all these: anger, wrath, malice, blasphemy, filthy language out of your mouth.Do not lie to one another, since you have put off the old man with his deeds, and have put on the new
who is renewed in knowledge according to the image of Him who created him,
where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcised nor uncircumcised, barbarian, Scythian, slave
free, but Christ
all and in all.

verses.text: Do not lie to one another, since you have put off the old man with his deeds,
parts: Do not lie to one another, since you have put off the old man with his deeds,

verses.text: and have put on the newmanwho is renewed in knowledge according to the image of Him who created him,
parts: and have put on the new
who is renewed in knowledge according to the image of Him who created him,

verses.text: where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcised nor uncircumcised, barbarian, Scythian, slavenorfree, but Christisall and in all.
parts: where there is neither Greek nor Jew, circumcised nor uncircumcised, barbarian, Scythian, slave
free, but Christ
all and in all.

verses.text: Therefore, astheelect of God, holy and beloved, put on tender mercies, kindness, humility, meekness, longsuffering; bearing with one another, and forgiving one another, if anyone has a complaint against another; even as Christ forgave you, so you alsomust do.But above all these things put on love, which is the bond of perfection.And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to which also you were called in one body; and be thankful.Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom, teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.And whatever you do in word or deed,doall in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through Him.
parts: Therefore, as

elect of God, holy and beloved, put on tender mercies, kindness, humility, meekness, longsuffering; bearing with one another, and forgiving one another, if anyone has a complaint against another; even as Christ forgave you, so you also
But above all these things put on love, which is the bond of perfection.And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to which also you were called in one body; and be thankful.

Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom, teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.And whatever you do in word or deed,
all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through Him.

verses.text: bearing with one another, and forgiving one another, if anyone has a complaint against another; even as Christ forgave you, so you alsomust do.
parts: bearing with one another, and forgiving one another, if anyone has a complaint against another; even as Christ forgave you, so you also

verses.text: But above all these things put on love, which is the bond of perfection.
parts: But above all these things put on love, which is the bond of perfection.

verses.text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to which also you were called in one body; and be thankful.
parts: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts, to which also you were called in one body; and be thankful.

verses.text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom, teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.
parts: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom, teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs, singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord.

verses.text: And whatever you do in word or deed,doall in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through Him.
parts: And whatever you do in word or deed,
all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through Him.

verses.text: Wives, submit to your own husbands, as is fitting in the Lord.
parts: Wives, submit to your own husbands, as is fitting in the Lord.

verses.text: Husbands, love your wives and do not be bitter toward them.
parts: Husbands, love your wives and do not be bitter toward them.

verses.text: Children, obey your parents in all things, for this is well pleasing to the Lord.
parts: Children, obey your parents in all things, for this is well pleasing to the Lord.

verses.text: Fathers, do not provoke your children, lest they become discouraged.
parts: Fathers, do not provoke your children, lest they become discouraged.

verses.text: Bondservants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh, not with eyeservice, as men-pleasers, but in sincerity of heart, fearing God.And whatever you do, do it heartily, as to the Lord and not to men, knowing that from the Lord you will receive the reward of the inheritance; forayou serve the Lord Christ.But he who does wrong will be repaid for what he has done, and there is no partiality.
parts: Bondservants, obey in all things your masters according to the flesh, not with eyeservice, as men-pleasers, but in sincerity of heart, fearing God.And whatever you do, do it heartily, as to the Lord and not to men, knowing that from the Lord you will receive the reward of the inheritance; for
you serve the Lord Christ.But he who does wrong will be repaid for what he has done, and there is no partiality.

verses.text: And whatever you do, do it heartily, as to the Lord and not to men,
parts: And whatever you do, do it heartily, as to the Lord and not to men,

verses.text: knowing that from the Lord you will receive the reward of the inheritance; forayou serve the Lord Christ.
parts: knowing that from the Lord you will receive the reward of the inheritance; for
you serve the Lord Christ.

verses.text: But he who does wrong will be repaid for what he has done, and there is no partiality.
parts: But he who does wrong will be repaid for what he has done, and there is no partiality.

verses.text: Continue earnestly in prayer, being vigilant in it with thanksgiving;meanwhile praying also for us, that God would open to us a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in chains, that I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.
parts: Continue earnestly in prayer, being vigilant in it with thanksgiving;
meanwhile praying also for us, that God would open to us a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in chains, that I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.

verses.text: meanwhile praying also for us, that God would open to us a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in chains,
parts: meanwhile praying also for us, that God would open to us a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ, for which I am also in chains,

verses.text: that I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.
parts: that I may make it manifest, as I ought to speak.

verses.text: Walk in wisdom toward thosewho areoutside, redeeming the time.Letyour speech alwaysbewith grace, seasoned with salt, that you may know how you ought to answer each one.
parts: Walk in wisdom toward those
outside, redeeming the time.
your speech always
with grace, seasoned with salt, that you may know how you ought to answer each one.

verses.text: Letyour speech alwaysbewith grace, seasoned with salt, that you may know how you ought to answer each one.
parts: your speech always
with grace, seasoned with salt, that you may know how you ought to answer each one.

verses.text: Tychicus, a beloved brother, faithful minister, and fellow servant in the Lord, will tell you all the news about me.I am sending him to you for this very purpose, that heamay know your circumstances and comfort your hearts, with Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who isoneof you. They will make known to you all things whichare happeninghere.
parts: Tychicus, a beloved brother, faithful minister, and fellow servant in the Lord, will tell you all the news about me.
I am sending him to you for this very purpose, that he
may know your circumstances and comfort your hearts, with Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is
of you. They will make known to you all things which
here.

verses.text: I am sending him to you for this very purpose, that heamay know your circumstances and comfort your hearts,
parts: I am sending him to you for this very purpose, that he
may know your circumstances and comfort your hearts,

verses.text: with Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who isoneof you.
parts: with Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is
of you.

verses.text: Aristarchus my fellow prisoner greets you, with Mark the cousin of Barnabas (about whom you received instructions: if he comes to you, welcome him), and Jesus who is called Justus. Theseare myonly fellow workers for the kingdom of God who are of the circumcision; they have proved to be a comfort to me.
parts: Aristarchus my fellow prisoner greets you, with Mark the cousin of Barnabas (about whom you received instructions: if he comes to you, welcome him), and Jesus who is called Justus. These
only fellow workers for the kingdom of God who are of the circumcision; they have proved to be a comfort to me.

verses.text: and Jesus who is called Justus.
parts: and Jesus who is called Justus.

verses.text: Epaphras, who isoneof you, a bondservant of Christ, greets you, always laboring fervently for you in prayers, that you may stand perfect and completeain all the will of God.For I bear him witness that he has a great zealafor you, and those who are in Laodicea, and those in Hierapolis.Luke the beloved physician and Demas greet you.Greet the brethren who are in Laodicea, and Nymphas and the church thatisin hisahouse.
parts: Epaphras, who is
of you, a bondservant of Christ, greets you, always laboring fervently for you in prayers, that you may stand perfect and complete
in all the will of God.For I bear him witness that he has a great zeal
for you, and those who are in Laodicea, and those in Hierapolis.Luke the beloved physician and Demas greet you.Greet the brethren who are in Laodicea, and Nymphas and the church that
in his
house.

for you, and those who are in Laodicea, and those in Hierapolis.

verses.text: Now when this epistle is read among you, see that it is read also in the church of the Laodiceans, and that you likewise read theepistlefrom Laodicea.And say to Archippus, “Take heed to the ministry which you have received in the Lord, that you may fulfill it.”
parts: Now when this epistle is read among you, see that it is read also in the church of the Laodiceans, and that you likewise read the
from Laodicea.
And say to Archippus, “Take heed to the ministry which you have received in the Lord, that you may fulfill it.”

verses.text: And say to Archippus, “Take heed to the ministry which you have received in the Lord, that you may fulfill it.”
parts: And say to Archippus, “Take heed to the ministry which you have received in the Lord, that you may fulfill it.”

verses.text: This salutation by my own hand—Paul. Remember my chains. Gracebewith you. Amen.
parts: This salutation by my own hand—Paul. Remember my chains. Grace
with you. Amen.
